forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Areas Of Fog
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog after midnight. Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a brilliant sun, painting the city with warm hues that flirt with the high seventies. If you venture out, be prepared for the brisk caress of the west-southwest wind, a lively companion that hums through the streets at 21 mph, swirling delightfully through the air with occasional gusts. As the hours glide by, this warmth will soften into a cooler embrace, settling around 67 degrees as day yields to night.

As nighttime approaches, the weather will invite an alluring veil of fog, creeping in subtly after midnight, hinting at a blend of mystery and charm that only San Francisco can offer. The clouds will part to reveal part of the moon, with nighttime temperatures gently falling to about 56. With a slight chill in the air, it would be wise to don light layers, allowing flexibility for the gentle caprices of the evening. This time of day calls for leisurely strolls along the waterfront, perhaps pausing for a thoughtful moment beneath the stars, where the coolness of the air dances with the lingering warmth from the day, creating a serene backdrop for reflection or quiet conversation.
